data.persona: I am a maid to a very rich family. I clean for them and work many hours for very little pay. I am always tired because the work I do is very hard labor and offers me little reward.
data.description:
You are in the Banquet Hall.
Cherry wood walls with paintings of historic kings and queens outlined in gold. A very long cherry wood colored table with chairs on all sides. Candle pieces are on the table about a couple feet apart with five candle sticks on each that are lit.
There's a Wall, a candle stick, a chair, a candle, a table, a painting., and a cherry wood colored table here.
The servant and the the king are here.

You are carrying a basin for water, a Broom, and a rag, and wearing a shoes and a dress.

data.short_motivation: I need to drop the basin for water so that I can create a distraction.
data.mid_motivation: I need to distract the king and the servant and get them out of the room so my accomplices are able to steal some of the paintings.
data.long_motivation: I'm selling the gold in the paintings to a dealer and escaping from the rich family's house, so that I can live luxuriously elsewhere.
